source_text: payment of 2.0% net smelter royalty on gold recovered from the Tenements which is above 12,000ozs and 2.0% net smelter royalty on all minerals, other than gold, recovered from the Tenements, pursuant to a royalty agreement to be entered into by the parties (Royalty Agreement).
additional_details: Royalty is payable by Beacon Minerals Limited (the Company) to Aurumin Limited and Aurumin's wholly owned subsidiary Aurumin Mt Dimer Pty Ltd (the Vendor). The royalty on gold is applicable only on production above 12,000ozs.
